message:
SYSTEM: Helio-no_animations.pdf: Página 13
Set your title here in Slide Master Options
Extension points
13
▪Extend the original framework
o Allows Helio to be setup using other mappings
• WoT, RML, …
o Extend formats supported by Helio (Datasource)
o Extend sources supported by Helio (Connector)
o Extend functions
▪Plugin system
o Implementing external code, and compiling a jar, Helio will 
automatically be able to use such plugin
o Extend sources supported by Helio (Connector)
• Third-party systems can be integrated with this 
mechanism
o
https://github.com/oeg-upm/helio-plugins
speaker: SYSTEM
